languages.text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: [draft] If the wearer kills an enemy or score a critical {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}, he gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g} until end of combat
If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.
If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.
If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

languages.text: 如果装备者击杀敌人或造成暴击，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}则获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者击杀敌人或造成暴击，{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}则获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Убив противника или совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Убив противника или совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца боя.
Убив противника или совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца боя.

languages.text: 使用者が敵をキルするか、またはクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}した場合、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を5獲得する。
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵をキルするか、またはクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}した場合、戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}を5獲得する。

languages.text: Si el portador mata a un enemigo o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} hasta finalizar el combate.
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador mata a un enemigo o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} hasta finalizar el combate.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g}.
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritischen Treffer{/g} landet, erlangt er +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique, il bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique, il bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique, il bénéficie de +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde veya kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} yaptığında +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.
